title: Part 3. Of the other virtues and vices

texts.title: Section 1. Of the origin of the natural virtues and vices
texts.sourceDesc: The first two Books of Hume’s [Treatise of Human Nature] were published together in 1739. The third Book, which included an Appendix making some changes to Book 1, was published in 1740. There was only one edition published in Hume’s lifetime, an this edition is therefore our copytext.
